>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.HcYYyiTFKmgVu94h]{Fixer}

You have an array of criminal contacts, so you know who to call when you need a tip, and your contacts are usually willing to help or point you to someone who can. Reduce your DC to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#gather-information]{gather information} on criminal enterprises and figures by 5. When you communicate or meet with a criminal for the first time, improve their initial attitude toward you by one step.

Your reputation also helps you coerce others. When you use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i]{Intimidate} to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#bully]{bully} someone who has heard of either you or those for whom you work, the effect of a successful check lasts for [[/r 1d6]]{1d6 days}.
